    PwAdLoader<T>  
    PwAdLoader.PwAdLoaderListener<T>  
    PwAdPrompt Deprecated
    AdPrompts have been depricated and will no longer serve, Please discontinue use.
    PwAdPrompt.PwAdPromptListener
    Implement this interface to be notified of AdPrompt lifecycle changes.
    PwAdRequest
    Request object used to hold request configuration details.
    PwAdRequest.Builder
    Builder object used to generate customized PwAdRequest objects.
    PwBannerAdView.BannerAdListener
    Implement this interface to be notified of banner ad lifecycle changes.
    PwInterstitialAd
    Interstitials are full screen ads that display in their own Activity.
    PwInterstitialAd.PwInterstitialAdListener
    Implement this interface to be notified of interstitial ad lifecycle changes.
    PwNativeAd  
    PwNativeAd.PwNativeAdListener  
    PwVideoInterstitialAd
    Video interstitials are full screen ads that display a video ad in their own Activity.
    PwVideoInterstitialAd.PwVideoInterstitialAdListener
    Implement this interface to be notified of video interstitial ad lifecycle changes.

Package com.phunware.advertising Description

This is the MaaS Advertising module.

Overview

The MaaS Advertising SDK provides app monetization functionality.

Build requirements

Android SDK 2.2+ (API level 8) or above

Prerequisites

The MaaS Advertising SDK requires the latest MaaS Core SDK. Be sure to install the module in the Application onCreate method before registering keys. For example: 
 @Override
 public void onCreate() {
     super.onCreate();
     // Other Code
     PwCoreSession.getInstance().installModules(PwAdvertisingModule.getInstance(), ...);
     // Other code
 }

Setup

Update the AndroidManifest.xml with to include the following permissions. These go outside of the application tag: 
 <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET"/>
 uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE"/>
 <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE"/>

 <!-- Optional permissions to enable ad geotargeting
 <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION"/>
 <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION"/>
 -->
An activity is used to display full screen ads. The activity should be defined inside of the application tag: 
 <!-- inside of your application tag: -->
 <activity
      android:name="com.phunware.advertising.internal.PwAdActivity"
      android:configChanges="keyboard|keyboardHidden|orientation|screenSize" />
